description:
Each player is assigned a unique ID in the range [0, 3]. In arrays of player
         data, player ID 0's data comes first and so on.

         
Each game consists of two teams and four players.

_Team 0_
* Players 0 and 1 are on team 0.
* Team 0 starts the first rally on the side of the court which contains the origin.
    * The origin (x=0 y=0 z=0) is located in the far-left corner of the court relative
      to the camera.
* Player 0 is the first server for their team.

_Team 1_
* Players 2 and 3 are on team 1.
* Player 2 is the first server for their team.
title: Player ID
